resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Revising and editing an essay</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einen Versuch verbessern und bearbeitend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mettant à jour et éditant un essai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Revisando e editando um essay</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modificando e stampando un saggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιθεώρηση και να επιμεληθεί ενός δοκίμιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revisando y corrigiendo un ensayo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn how to revise and edit an essay. In particular, they will focus on pronoun agreement. This is the third lesson in a series of three based upon LEARN NC's 9th grade writing exemplars.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen, wie man einen Versuch 
verbessert und bearbeitet. Insbesondere konzentrieren sie auf 
Pronomenvereinbarung. Dieses ist die dritte Lektion in einer 
Reihe von drei auf gegründet ERLERNEN Grad-Schreiben Exemplare NCs 
9..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront comment mettre à jour 
et éditer un essai. En particulier, ils se concentreront sur 
l'accord de pronom. C'est la troisième leçon dans une série 
de trois basés lors APPRENNENT les exemplaires d'écriture de la 
catégorie d'OR 9ème.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão como revisar e editar um 
essay. No detalhe, focalizarão no acordo do pronome. Esta
é a terceira lição em uma série de três baseados upon APRENDE 
exemplars da escrita da classe do NC ø.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno come modificare e stampare 
un saggio. In particolare, metteranno a fuoco su accordo di 
pronome. Ciò è la terza lezione in serie di tre basati su 
IMPARA i exemplars di scrittura del grado del NC nono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν πώς να αναθεωρήσουν και να 
επιμεληθούν ένα δοκίμιο. Ειδικότερα, θα εστιάσουν στη 
συμφωνία αντωνυμίας. Αυτό είναι το τρίτο μάθημα σε μία 
σειρά τριών που βασίζεται LEARN NC στα 9α υποδείγματα 
γραψίματος βαθμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán cómo revisar y 
corregir un ensayo. En detalle, se centrarán en el acuerdo del 
pronombre. Ésta es la tercera lección en una serie de tres 
basados sobre APRENDE los exemplars de la escritura del grado del NC 
9no.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106556</entry>
